gen:link.msg:message: `ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GeneralAdministrativeExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_GeneralAdministrativeExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_GeneralAdministrativeExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ImpairmentCurrentAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_ImpairmentCurrentAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_ImpairmentCurrentAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) SHOULD be reported, because `NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) SHOULD be reported, because `NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD be equal to + `ResultAfterTax` - `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingExpensesOther` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_OperatingExpensesOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_OperatingExpensesOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `GrossMargin` - `SumOfExpenses`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_OperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_OperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossMargin')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossMargin return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `OperatingResultCashFlow`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST101Variable1_OperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST101Variable1_OperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST101Variable1_OperatingResultCashFlow')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST101Variable1_OperatingResultCashFlow return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultAfterTax` SHOULD be equal to + `ResultBeforeTax` - `IncomeTaxExpense` + `ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ResultBeforeTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ResultBeforeTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_IncomeTaxExpense')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_IncomeTaxExpense return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementMedium_PrtFST103Variables1_ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
